item.title: Articles
item.description: Below is a list of blog posts, talks, articles, and presentations on InnerSource. 2020: [May 6, 2020] Danese Cooper, Why InnerSource is a critical component of FOSS sustainability, GitHub Satellite Virtual 2020 (also see Q&A after the talk) [Apr 24, 2020] Danese Cooper and Roy Fielding - The Journey to InnerSource - The Apache Way: Part 1, Part 2 [Jan 31, 2020] Enrico Hartung, Europaceâ€™s journey to InnerSource 2019:

item.title: InnerSource Patterns
item.description: InnerSource best practices codified in a specific format to make it easy to understand, evaluate, and apply them in your context.
